summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 7, Thompson's University Addition, being the alley in the block bounded on the north by East 56th Street, and by Ravenna Boulevard; on the south by East 55th Street; on the east by 20th Avenue Northeast; and on the west by 17th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7644 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
